CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The intrinsic properties of PCDSeBT are not only characterized by UV - vis absorption , cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) , and organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) but also the surface morphology , mobilities of space charge - limited current ( SCLC ) model , and polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) in its bulkheterojunction ( BHJ ) active layer with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) are evaluated in detail.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PCDSeBT      |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PCDSeBT      |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The intrinsic properties of PCDSeBT are not only characterized by UV - vis absorption , cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) , and organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) but also the surface morphology , mobilities of space charge - limited current ( SCLC ) model , and polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) in its bulkheterojunction ( BHJ ) active layer with [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) are evaluated in detail.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| intrinsic properties of PCDSeBT |
| UV - vis absorption |
| cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) |
| organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) |
| surface morphology |
| mobilities of space charge - limited current ( SCLC ) model |
| polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) |
| bulkheterojunction ( BHJ ) active layer |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| intrinsic properties of PCDSeBT |
| UV - vis absorption |
| cyclic voltammetry ( CV ) |
| organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) |
| surface morphology |
| mobilities of space charge - limited current ( SCLC ) model |
| polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) in its bulkheterojunction ( BHJ ) active layer |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) in the BHJ active layer |

The entities "intrinsic properties of PCDSeBT", "bulkheterojunction (BHJ)" and "in its bulkheterojunction (BHJ) active layer" can be considered as context that sets the stage for the discussion of material properties. Therefore, they are included in the table. However, "PCDSeBT" itself is not a property, but rather the material whose properties are being discussed. Similarly, "active layer" is a contextual term used to describe where the properties are being measured.

The entities "PCs" and "solar cells" are types of materials, specifically polymer solar cells. Therefore, "polymer solar cells (PSCs)" is included in the table as a property, as it refers to a specific type of material property.

The entities "mobilities of space charge - limited current (SCLC)" and "mobilities" are related to a material property, specifically the mobility of charge carriers in a material under specific conditions. Therefore, they are included in the table.

The entities "surface morphology" and "morphology" refer to the physical structure and shape of a material at the surface level, which is a material property. Therefore, they are included in the table.

The entities "UV - vis absorption", "cyclic voltammetry (CV)", and "organic field - effect transistors (OFETs)" are all techniques used to measure material properties, specifically the absorption spectrum, redox properties, and electrical conductivity, respectively. Therefore, they are not material properties themselves, but rather methods used to characterize material properties. However, they are included in the table for completeness, as they are mentioned in the context of characterizing the properties of PCDSeBT.

The entity "[6,6]-phenyl C 71 -butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM)" is a specific material used in the BHJ active layer of the PSCs. It is included in the table as a property, as it is a material that is being evaluated along with the other properties of the PCDSeBT material.
